name: agora-appbuilder-core
description: React Native template for RTE app builder

scripts.vercel-build: npm run dev-setup && cd template && npm run web:build && cd .. && npm run copy-vercel
scripts.uikit: rm -rf template/agora-rn-uikit && git clone https://github.com/AgoraIO-Community/ReactNative-UIKit.git template/agora-rn-uikit && cd template/agora-rn-uikit && git checkout release/fpe-1.0.0
scripts.dev-setup: npm run uikit && npm run deps && node devSetup.js
scripts.web-build: cd template && npm run web:build && cd .. && npm run copy-vercel
scripts.copy-vercel: cp -r Builds/web template/dist && cp vercel.json template/dist
